game_description: Do you have what it takes to survive and become the ultimate pilot? Fly missions for the cartel and experience a new genre of VR Flight Simulator, exclusively for the Quest. Your plane has experienced engine failure and you're forced to land at an unmarked runway off in the distance. Unfortunately for you, the runway is operated by a notoriously dangerous South American Cartel. Your only chance for survival is to work with the cartel and prove your worth. Features: - Complex missions that will keep you thinking. - Interactive cockpit. Flip switches, press buttons, and manipulate levers with your hand. - Make use of your belongings in the cockpit including sun glasses, coffee, and a hand gun. - Solve puzzles in a flight game! - Movie style campaign and missions - 7 Airports and over 2,000 square miles of scenery - Explore vast landscapes
review_1: This game is probably the most realistic in terms of flight sims on the Oculus quest, which is surprising since it isn't meant to only be a flight sim. The story was quite interesting too, though I'll admit I didn't follow it very well. The only real problem I have with it is that there aren't any checkpoints while your in the air, so if you mess up the landing you have to restart the entire mission.
review_2: Can you make the grip on levers WAY less slippery? When I have to pull the landing gear lever 10x until it locks into place, and I say to myself "what a horrible world". Fix this yesterday please. I wanna grab something and hold onto it like a DJ's fingers on a turn table if necessary. Am I supposed to play standing up? Fix this please, fix it!
